text: Which of the following statement is/are False? (a) If every states of DFA are final states then its equivalent minimized DFA has exactly one state. (b) If a language is regular then its DFA has at least one final state. (c) If a language is non-regular then its cardinality is always infinite. (d) Every reachable state from initial state in DFA may be non â€”final states but it has at least one final states.
